description: This table contains information about custom documents built on this referral. These documents are stored in release of information (ROI) records.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CUSTOM_DOC_ROI_ID
columns.description: This item contains a list of Release of Information (ROI) IDs. These ROIs were created in the Custom Document Builder.
